Package com.berthoud.project3oc.gameclasses

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Game1
    Abstract class for "Game +/- ".
    Game1ModeChallenger
    The program Game1ModeChallenger implements the first game (+/-) in the mode challenger: the user tries to break the computer's code
    Game1ModeDefender
    The program Game1ModeDefender implements the first game (+/-) in the mode defender: the user chooses a code and the computer tries to break it
    Game2
    Abstract class for Mastermind.
    Game2ModeChallenger
    The program Game2ModeChallenger implements the Mastermind in the mode challenger: the user tries to break the computer's code
    Game2ModeDefender
    The program Game2ModeDefender implements the Mastermind in the mode defender: the computer tries to break the player's code
    GameModeDuel
    The program GameModeDuel makes possible to play either the " + / - game" or the digit Mastermind in a duel mode.
    Games
    * Abstract class for both games ("Game +/- " and Mastermind) It contains all the instance fields and methods shared by both games
    MyTools
    This class contains static methods that can be useful in different contexts beyond the 2 games
